data: Hashimoto, Akikazu Akikazu Hashimoto aki@physics.wisc.edu (608) 265-3244 5209 Chamberlin Hall String Theory gauge/gravity correspondence, non-commutative geometry, supergravity, string field theory, integrable systems, matrix models, QCD Directions to room 5209, Chamberlin Hall or stairs to the 5th floor. Facing into the hallway, away from the two elevators, turn right. Follow the hallway to room 5209, which will be on your left. Research Groups Subatomic Theory Subatomic Theory Research in theoretical subatomic physics is carried on in the Department in a number of groups as well as in collaborations between members of the various groups: High Energy Phenomenology Nuclear Theory Particle Theory (NPAC) String Theory Please refer to the individual group websites for more information.
